text: Slow at delivery and they always fixed everything different especially on the pizza. The toppings are never equal. On the all meat pizza they always put 10 times more sausage then any other toppings and sometimes they don't even pit what comes on it.

name: Sandy Claypool
text:
This place is always clean and has a nice variety of pizza on the lunch buffet. They have fresh salad fixings and salad toppings.
I wish the Rogersville Pizza Plus was as good as this one.

name: Sonya Hall
text: Pizza and salad was good. The girl working must have been new and they seemed to be short on staff because we waited over 30 minutes for a  medium pizza (1/2 cheese and 1/2 pepperoni). Other than the slowness, the restaurant was clean and the girl was friendly.
